scripts.clean: rm -rf client/dist && rm -rf client/node_modules && rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf ~/.vite && rm -rf client/.vite
scripts.build: export NODE_ENV=production && npm run clean && cd client && npm install --omit=dev && npm run build && cd .. && npx prisma generate --schema=./server/prisma/schema.prisma && npx prisma db push --schema=./server/prisma/schema.prisma
